name: Space Climber
description:
Two space exterminators prepared to clean the galaxy from vermin. Collect ammo for your rifle and oxygen tanks. Old school game, fun, difficult and addictive. Compatible with keyboard and controller.

30 stages
30 enemies and traps.
38 achievements.
1 or 2 players.
Compatible with keyboard and controller.
Retro graphics and rhythmic music.
Fun and difficulty of the old school.
